items.title: Health Data Management
items.description: Master's degree in health data collection, entry, analysis and interpretation, with solid experience in the field.

items.title: Solid Knowledge in Epidemiology
items.description: Familiar with the implementation and monitoring of immunisation activities, with a constant commitment to ensuring effective coverage and optimal process flow.

items.title: Scientific Writing
items.description: Knowledge of writing and publishing scientific articles, demonstrated by solid experience in the field.

items.title: Project Management
items.description: Experienced in supervising field teams, with proven skills in planning, organising and monitoring public health activities. Able to write detailed and relevant activity reports.

items.title: Interpersonal Skills
items.description: Excellent ability to communicate and interact with various stakeholders. Adaptability to different contexts, with an aptitude for initiative and independent work to effectively address challenges.

items.title: Personal Development
items.description: Commitment to continuous improvement through certifications, MOOCs, and additional training. Active participation in events to share experiences and highlight research achievements.
